configurations.name: 🔍 Template Validator
args: import json; import sys; print('🔍 Validating Portainer Template...'); data = json.load(open('web/portainer-template.json')); print(f'✅ JSON Valid - {len(data["templates"])} templates found'); [print(f'❌ Template {i}: Missing required field "{field}"') for i, t in enumerate(data['templates']) if not t.get(field) for field in ['title', 'description', 'type']]; print('🎯 Validation Complete!')
